My first attempt in a tofu scramble

by Dzvinka | Aug 6, 2015 | ux

In order to lead - IT needs to communicate.

For IT concerns to be heard and understood Even in companies where IT actually brings the value - their voice gets lost while voice of other departments becomes ever so loud.

That is not to say that quiet IT is more important than others. Rather sucessful company is a result of a harmony by all the parts being on the same page. When one of the parts (IT) is lost - harmony gets lost with it. The result id a distorted view of the "state of affairs".

However, IT guys can and should fix it for themselves by themselves. At the end of the day, they are the smartest guys in the building.

Read couple of books: - Soft Skills Generally be a psyhchologycally stable person - Dont care what others think about you
